text:
Water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 90.82 feet on Saturday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage was 53.593 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc.

The dam was receiving an inflow of 424 cusecs.

About 12,000 cusecs is discharged from the

dam for Samba cultivation in the Cauvery delta region.
title: Mettur level
